Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/35th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 39th, Wallace, 31st and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 39th, Wallace, 31st and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/35th.

Allow extra travel time.
